Key Match Events: James Harden had 24 points and 12 rebounds for a double-double
Norm Powell had 24 points against his former team
Immanuel Quickley scored 21 points and four assists in 25 minutes
Quickley had a game-tying drive and three in the final 1:39
RJ Barrett missed lay-up attempts in the final seconds
Pre-Game Insights: The Clippers are a relatively deep team that competes hard
Leonard is out indefinitely with inflammation in his surgically-repaired knee
Paul George is helping the Philadelphia 76ers not win
Post-Match Reflections: The Clippers improved to 6-4 with the win
It would've felt even better for Quickley if they had won the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Intuit Dome is the most expensive arena ever built at a reported $2 billion
The Clippers had enough to overcome a Raptors team that had two days to prepare in Los Angeles
Toronto Raptors traded Norm Powell to Portland in 2021 for Gary Trent Jr.
Others: Los Angeles Clippers fans aren’t all that excited about watching a team scuffle along for a chance at the play-in tournament
The Raptors aren’t immune to best-laid plans going a bit sideways
Powell was averaging 19.6 points a game while connecting on 43.9 per cent of his threes the year the Raptors traded him in 2020-21
